uploadDialog.title: Upload Image
uploadDialog.description: Select an image file to upload
uploadDialog.dragDropHint: Drag and drop an image file here, or click to select

imageList.title: Uploaded Images
imageList.uploadPrompt: Please upload an image to analyze
imageList.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this image?

supplements.productInfoDesc: Please enter any supplementary information about the product to help AI better understand and analyze the image content.
supplements.architectureDesc: Please enter any supplementary information about the information architecture to help AI better analyze the architecture in the image.

requirementDialog.title: Requirement Overview
requirementDialog.description: Please provide an overview of the requirements to help generate a requirement draft from the prototype image

contentDisplay.waitingForModel: Waiting for the model to process the image...
contentDisplay.emptyProcessingResult: Processing completed, but no valid content was obtained. Please try again or contact an administrator.

notifications.selectImage: Please select at least one image file for processing
notifications.downloadSuccessDesc: {contentType} has been saved as a file
notifications.downloadFailedDesc: Please manually copy the content and save
notifications.deleteSuccessDesc: File has been deleted from storage
notifications.cacheDraftDesc: Image draft has been cached locally (isolated by system)
notifications.noDraftContent: No draft content available to cache

PromptDebugPage.title: Prompt Debugging
PromptDebugPage.promptPlaceholder: Enter prompt, use {{parameter_name}} to mark parameters...
PromptDebugPage.outputPrompt: Please enter a prompt and select a model to run

modelDialog.description: Configure a large language model for prompt debugging
modelDialog.apiKeyWillBeEncrypted: API key will be stored in encrypted form

notifications.clearSuccessDesc: All inputs and outputs have been cleared
notifications.clearCacheSuccessDesc: Test data cache has been cleared
notifications.modelInputIncompleteDesc: Please fill in all required fields

RequirementUploadPage.title: Document Comprehensive Processing
RequirementUploadPage.subtitle: Upload requirement documents in various formats for AI-assisted analysis and processing.

tooltips.modelRequirement: Please ensure you select a model with long context and DOCX support (e.g., qwen-long) for optimal processing.

uploadSection.title: Upload Document
uploadSection.description: Please upload requirement documents (DOCX format recommended for Qwen-long, PDF for Gemini)
uploadSection.dragDropHint: Drag and drop file here, or click to select
uploadSection.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, DOCX, MD, TXT (Max 10MB)
uploadSection.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format, please upload Word, TXT, PDF, Excel or Markdown files

fileList.title: Uploaded Documents
fileList.selectionHint: Multiple files selection: MD conversion supports single file, test case generation supports multiple, requirement comparison requires two files

contentDisplay.waitingForModel: Waiting for the model to process...

terminology.noValidTermsFound: No valid terminology data found. Please ensure the table format is correct. Possible reasons: Could not find table header or separator row, or data row format is invalid.

test.title: Generate Test Cases
test.description: Please enter the requirement chapter title or description (up to 50 characters) you want to process for more accurate test case generation. Leave empty if no specific chapter is needed.
test.noChapters: No chapters found in the document

terminology.title: Add Domain Identifier
terminology.description: Please enter a domain identifier (optional, up to 10 characters) that will be combined with the terminology type. For example: entering 'RBS' with type 'Business Module' results in 'RBS, Business Module'.

summary.title: Enter Domain Information
summary.description: Please enter the domain information for this requirement summary, which will help better organize and manage requirements.

boundary.title: Requirement Comparison
boundary.description: Please select two files for boundary knowledge extraction and comparison analysis
boundary.twoFilesRequired: Boundary knowledge extraction requires exactly two files (draft and final version)

notifications.processingDesc: Document is being processed, please wait...
notifications.downloadSuccessDesc: Content has been downloaded as a file
notifications.downloadFailedDesc: Please manually copy the content and save
notifications.tooManyFiles: Too many files selected, please select a maximum of {max} files
notifications.selectSystemFirst: Please select a system in the top right corner
notifications.architectureImported: Architecture information has been successfully imported to the system
notifications.noArchitectureContent: No architecture content available to import
notifications.noTerminologyContent: No terminology content available to import
notifications.noSummaryContent: No summary content available to import
notifications.summaryImported: Requirement summary has been successfully imported
notifications.saveMetadataFailed: Failed to save file metadata to database
